title: Emperor of the Galaxy - Novel Updates
tags: Futuristic Setting   Military   Nobles   Outer Space   Politics   Wars
author: 坂田火魯志
description: 1000 years later in the wide galaxy, amongst the four civilizations, the human race is currently in turmoil. In these conflicted times within the many stars, the heroes appear. Will these heroes change the galaxy with their hands? This is a tale about these heroes and the stars around them.>
